author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Microchip Technology Inc prices $2 bln note offering
text:
May 23 (Reuters) - Microchip Technology Inc:
* PRICES $2.0 BILLION NOTE OFFERING * PRICING OF TWO SERIES OF ITS NOTES IN AN AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF $2.0 BILLION IN AN UNREGISTERED OFFERING
* OF THESE NOTES, $1 BILLION WILL MATURE ON JUNE 1, 2021 AND WILL BEAR INTEREST AT AN ANNUAL RATE OF 3.922 PERCENT
* THE OTHER $1 BILLION NOTES WILL MATURE ON JUNE 1, 2023 AND WILL BEAR INTEREST AT AN ANNUAL RATE OF 4.333 PERCENT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
